patterns.name: Missing Technical Context

patterns.name: Vague Requirements
patterns.suggestion: Specify what needs to be optimized and the target metrics

beforeAfter.after: Optimize the user dashboard load time from 3s to under 1s by improving SQL query performance

patterns.name: Potential Security Risk
patterns.suggestion: Never disable security features or store sensitive data insecurely, even for testing

beforeAfter.after: Create a test user account with proper authentication for integration testing

highSeverityResponse.topSuggestion: Review security practices in your prompts - avoid requesting insecure implementations
